posts.post_content:
For sale are the following-listed HOF T206s.  I know the pictures are not great (I am sorry), but email me and I can send scans, which were too large to attach here.  These are all quite nice and reflective of the grades given.  There is zero staining or creases on any cards (Aside from creasing on the Willis Tolstoi and stains on the two PBs).  Some of these cards are highest graded on combined SGC/PSA pop reports.  The prices listed are net to me.  Email inquiries are preferred: [url]rhotchkiss@horizonlandco.com[/url].  I am also open to trades.

I also have an Evers, Broadleaf 350, PSA 1 to sell -- $1600 (email me if want scans)

[STRIKE]Cy Young w/ Glove, SGC 82 (6.5), SC 350-460, 25[/STRIKE]: TRADED
[STRIKE]Christy Mathewson white cap, PSA 6, Pied 350[/STRIKE]:       REMOVED
Walter Johnson pitchsing, SGC 60 (5), Old Mill:        $2,600
[STRIKE]Nap Lajoie w/ bat, SGC 70 (5.5), Tolstoi[/STRIKE]:                 REMOVED
Vic Willis, Portrait, SGC 60 (5), Hindu:                     $3,600
John McGraw, glove hip, SGC 60 (5), AB 460:           $1,500
Chief Bender, pitching w/ trees, PSA 6, Cycle 350:    $2,200
[STRIKE]Addie Joss, pitching, PSA 6, Polar Bear:   [/STRIKE]                 SOLD
Home Run Baker, SGC 60 (5), Tolstoi:                      $900 (back on market)
John McGraw, golve hip, PSA 3, Tolstoi:                    $   225
[STRIKE]Sam Crawford, batting, PSA 3, EPDG:                       $  450[/STRIKE] SOLD
[STRIKE]Sam Crawford, batting, PSA 3.5, Tolstoi:[/STRIKE]                   SOLD
Vic Willis, batting, SGC 60 (5), Polar Bear:                $  300
Vic Willis, batting, SGC 10 (1), Tolstoi:                      $  150
Those are awesome cards. The Willis Portrait is a great Hindu back

[quote name="MVSNYC" post=1677419]Ryan, PM Sent. Great offering.[/QUOTE]

Not worth it, edited post...

[quote name="CMIZ5290" post=1677483]Not worth it...This guy has wasted my time big time. Good luck on future deals....[/QUOTE]

Hmmmm. Perhaps it is not my place but I would like for the original poster to know that I have done many T206 deals with MVSNYC buying, selling, trading, and that this has been consistent for several years now. Just stating my own personal experience for the original poster to consider.

My apologies for hijacking the thread.

Derek Hogue

PS

This really is an amazing group of T206 ...

Thanks Ryan! Pleasure dealing with you.
